versions.name: Runtime SDK Production Hardening
versions.description: Production-ready rootly-runtime SDK with critical bug fixes, performance improvements, and clean public API

features.title: Severity Support
features.description: Capture errors with error/warning/info severity levels

features.title: Environment Normalization
features.description: Automatic production/preview normalization with NODE_ENV fallback

features.title: Debug Mode
features.description: Optional stderr logging for SDK visibility and troubleshooting

features.title: Recursive Capture Protection
features.description: Symbol flag prevents infinite loops if SDK throws errors

features.title: Stable Fingerprinting
features.description: Improved deduplication with normalized whitespace and consistent stack parsing

features.title: Hard Memory Cap
features.description: Max 500 fingerprints with auto-cleanup to prevent unbounded growth

features.title: Optimized Rate Limiter
features.description: O(n) performance with single splice operation

features.title: Clean Public API
features.description: Removed apiUrl from InitOptions, use ROOTLY_API_URL env var for advanced config

versions.name: IDE Extension Release
versions.description: Professional VS Code extension with Go to Error functionality, expandable incident cards, and real-time notifications

features.title: Go to Error Location
features.description: One-click navigation to exact file and line where errors occurred with automatic stack trace parsing

features.title: Expandable Incident Cards
features.description: Click incidents to see environment, timestamps, and commit SHA in a clean interface

features.title: New Incident Notifications
features.description: Desktop alerts when new incidents are detected with quick action buttons

features.title: Manual Refresh
features.description: Rate-limited refresh button (5 per 2 minutes) with toolbar quick actions

features.title: Professional UI Redesign
features.description: Clean, minimal interface with VS Code native icons throughout

features.title: Enhanced OAuth Flow
features.description: Minimal, professional IDE authentication page matching webapp theme

extension: Stack trace parsing (TS, JS, Python, Java, Go, Ruby, PHP)

versions.name: Production Hardening
versions.description: Critical deployment fixes for cross-domain authentication and session management

features.title: Cross-Site Cookie Support
features.description: SameSite=None configuration for Vercel-to-EC2 authentication

features.title: Session Race Condition Fix
features.description: Explicit session saving before OAuth redirect to prevent login loops

features.title: Route Architecture Cleanup
features.description: Separated OAuth and API routes to eliminate endpoint conflicts

features.title: Security Hardening
features.description: Removed token exposure from API responses and added debug logging

features.title: Proxy Trust Configuration
features.description: Added trust proxy for secure cookies behind reverse proxies

versions.name: Production-Ready Error Ingestion
versions.description: Hardened ingest endpoint with strict validation and new incidents read API

features.title: Hardened Ingest Endpoint
features.description: POST /api/ingest with strict validation for commit SHA, environment, and timestamps

features.title: Enhanced Data Capture
features.description: Stack traces, error types, commit SHAs, environment, and occurrence timestamps

features.title: Incidents Read API
features.description: GET /api/incidents with JWT auth, filtering, and pagination

features.title: Commit SHA Validation
features.description: Enforces 40-character lowercase hex Git SHAs

features.title: Comprehensive Documentation
features.description: Testing guides, migration docs, and API examples

database: New fields: stack_trace, error_type, commit_sha, environment, occurred_at

versions.name: Web App Foundation
versions.description: Core web application with GitHub OAuth, project management, and premium dashboard UI

features.title: GitHub OAuth Integration
features.description: Secure authentication and repository access

features.title: Project Management
features.description: Create, view, and delete projects with API keys

features.title: Premium UI Design
features.description: Modern, responsive interface with dark theme

features.title: User Dashboard
features.description: Project overview and management interface

features.title: Logout Functionality
features.description: Secure session management and logout

versions.name: Error Dashboard
versions.description: Real-time error monitoring, analytics, and debugging tools

features.title: Error Analytics
features.description: Charts, trends, and error frequency analysis

features.title: Error Grouping
features.description: Intelligent error clustering and deduplication

features.title: Source Code Viewer
features.description: View error context with syntax highlighting

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Assign errors, add comments, track resolution
